entities.name: hepzibah
entities.description: Hepzibah is described as having tiny eyes fixed upon Voldemort's handsome features. She is also mentioned to be leaning forwards with a loud creaking of corsets and pinching Voldemort's hollow cheek.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as having handsome features and his face shows a shadow when the cup is taken away. He is also mentioned to be examining an engraving on a cup.

entities.name: helga hufflepuff
entities.description: Helga Hufflepuff is mentioned as the owner of the cup, which has been handed down in her family for years.

relationships.description: Hepzibah is interested in Voldemort's reaction to the cup, as she leans forwards and pinches his cheek.
Helga Hufflepuff owns the cup, which has been handed down in her family for years.
Hepzibah possesses the cup and keeps it safe in a box.
Voldemort examines an engraving on the cup.
